title: Ep245 Bad Bakeries
description:
This week, the gals put on their aprons and roll out some stories of problematic pastries. Topics include the truth behind Subway's bread, a bear named Cookie, and a bookkeeper hungry for that sweet, sweet fruitcake fortune. Grab a bottle of Winc's Wonderful White Blend, check on your mother, and tune in for Bad Bakeries.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
